personalInfo.name: Anudeep Sri Bathina
personalInfo.title: Lead Data Scientist | AI Architect
personalInfo.summary: Lead Data Scientist with 9+ years of expertise in architecting scalable AI systems, Large Language Models (LLMs), and retrieval pipelines. I specialize in designing production-grade data platforms and deploying Generative AI solutions that drive enterprise innovation. Recognized as a thought leader, author, and mentor, I actively contribute to the global AI community through publications, talks, and workforce development.

experience.description: Architecting enterprise GenAI solutions and LLM systems. Leading the development of customized data solutions, including Python-based parsers and automated data interpretation models. Overseeing deployment of APIs using FastAPI and optimizing retrieval systems with Azure Vector Search and Cosmos DB.
Directed ML engineering teams to build robust data pipelines and predictive models. Awarded the ‘Extra Mile Award’ for high-impact delivery and technical leadership in scaling data products.
Engineered scalable PySpark pipelines resulting in ~30% performance improvement. Developed client-focused interfaces and optimized database queries for complex datasets.
Led cloud data migration projects and implemented predictive analytics models. specialized in automated data migration and visualization of key business insights.

education.description: Specialized research on domain-adapted computer vision using YOLOv8 and ResNet-50. Focus on Advanced Algorithms and AI.
Foundation in Computer Science and Engineering. Active involvement in robotics projects and technical societies.
